description: Quarterly profits were down for BMW.
contentencoded: BMW is having a bad day on the stock market. Its share price in Germany is down 3.4 percent after it reported quarterly profits were down 3.7 percent. Michelle Krebs, senior analyst and editor-at-large at Edmunds, tells Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio why.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, November 5, 2013
title: Tough times for the ultimate driving machine
teaser: Quarterly profits were down for BMW.
